actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Maria and Timofei Chmykhalov, and for Lilia, Peter, Liubov, Lidia, and Augustina Vashchenko.

summary.text: Authorizes the granting of a visa admission to the United States for permanent residence to seven named individuals. Declares such individuals to have been physically present and residing in the United States since a specified date.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Maria and Timofei Chmykhalov, and for Lilia, Peter, Liubov, Lidia, and Augustina Vashchenko.
